name: Stack Game (Manolore)
description:
i liked wordle, thought what if wordle but with cards. made a game about that idea, regretted it. Uploaded it on itch.io :D

You get 16 cards. try to guess 4 cards that program chose at random in order. You get hints that are similar to wordle where green is correct, yellow is on the wrong position, and red is not there.

(i forgot to update the rules and got lazy midway through programming so ignore what I wrote there)
